The result is a small but potent shot of espresso with a rich, creamy texture.

data.translation: an electric kitchen appliance used to chop, slice, shred, or puree food
data.description: A food processor is a versatile kitchen appliance used for a variety of food preparation tasks, such as chopping, slicing, shredding, pureeing, and mixing. It typically consists of a motorized base unit with a removable bowl and a variety of interchangeable blades and attachments. Food processors come in various sizes, from compact models suitable for small kitchens to large, heavy-duty units used in commercial settings. They are equipped with powerful motors and sharp blades that make quick work of chopping vegetables, grinding nuts, kneading dough, and blending sauces and dips. Food processors are valued for their efficiency, speed, and versatility, allowing cooks to save time and effort in the kitchen.

data.translation: a kitchen appliance used for deep frying food items by immersing them in hot oil or fat
data.description: A fryer is a kitchen appliance used for deep-frying food by submerging it in hot oil. It typically consists of a large pot or basin, a heating element to heat the oil, and a basket or mesh insert to hold the food while it cooks. Fryers can be electric or gas-powered, and they come in various sizes and styles, from countertop models suitable for home use to larger commercial fryers found in restaurants and fast-food establishments. They are valued for their ability to quickly cook foods to a crispy, golden-brown texture, such as French fries, chicken wings, and battered seafood.

data.translation: a machine used for crushing or breaking food such as pepper, coffee, etc. into powder or very small pieces
data.description: A grinder is a kitchen tool or appliance used for breaking down or reducing solid substances into smaller, more manageable pieces or powders. Grinders typically consist of a grinding mechanism, such as blades or burrs within a container or casing. They can be manual or electric, with electric models powered by motors to automate the grinding process. Grinders are commonly used for grinding coffee beans into grounds for brewing coffee, spices into powder for seasoning dishes, or grains into flour for baking. They come in various types and sizes, from handheld spice grinders to countertop coffee grinders or larger industrial-grade mills.

data.translation: a portable electric appliance used for cooking or heating food and liquids
data.description: A hot plate is a small, portable cooking appliance that consists of a flat heating surface powered by electricity or gas. It is used for cooking food in situations where a traditional stove or oven is not available or convenient, such as dorm rooms, small kitchens, or camping trips. Hot plates come in various sizes and styles, ranging from single-burner models to larger units with multiple heating zones. They are versatile tools suitable for boiling, simmering, frying, or warming up food in pots, pans, or skillets placed directly on the hot surface.

data.translation: a machine used for freezing and mixing ice cream, sorbet, and frozen yogurt, with a motorized unit, a mixing paddle, and a container for the mixture
data.description: An ice cream maker is a kitchen appliance used to make homemade ice cream, sorbet, or frozen yogurt. It works by mixing ingredients, such as cream, sugar, and flavorings, while freezing the mixture at the same time. This process helps to create a smooth and creamy texture. There are different types of ice cream makers, including those that require pre-freezing the bowl and others with built-in compressors for automatic freezing. Ice cream makers are popular for making customized flavors and textures, offering a fun and easy way to prepare frozen desserts at home.

data.translation: an electric kitchen tool used for removing the juice of fruits and vegetables
a machine that cuts meat into very small pieces
data.description: A meat grinder is a kitchen appliance specifically designed for grinding meat into smaller pieces or mincing it finely. It typically consists of a hopper where the meat is placed, a feeding tube to guide the meat into the grinding mechanism, and a variety of cutting plates with different hole sizes to control the fineness of the grind. Meat grinders can be manual, operated by hand, or electric, powered by a motor for faster and more efficient grinding. They are commonly used for preparing ground meat for dishes such as burgers, sausages, meatballs, and meatloaf, as well as for processing other ingredients like vegetables or nuts.

data.translation: a kitchen appliance used for slicing meat or other foods into thin, even slices.
data.description: A meat slicer is a kitchen appliance used for slicing meats, cheeses, vegetables, and other food items into thin, uniform slices. It typically consists of a sharp blade mounted on a carriage that moves back and forth across the food item, allowing for precise slicing thickness adjustments. Meat slicers can be manual, operated by hand, or electric, powered by a motor for faster and more efficient slicing. They come in various sizes and styles, from small countertop models for home use to larger commercial-grade units found in delis or restaurants.

data.translation: a special grinding machine that crushes grain into flour
data.description: A mill is a machine used for grinding or crushing solid materials into smaller particles or powders. It typically consists of a rotating cylindrical container or chamber with a grinding mechanism inside, such as blades, burrs, or stones, that crushes the material as it rotates. Mills come in various types and sizes, including grain mills for grinding grains into flour, pepper mills for grinding peppercorns, coffee mills for grinding coffee beans, and spice mills for grinding spices.

data.translation: a pot that has a tight lid and can quickly cook food using high-pressure steam
data.description: A pressure cooker is a kitchen appliance used for cooking food quickly under high pressure and temperature. It typically consists of a tightly sealed pot with a locking lid and a pressure release valve. When heated, the liquid inside the pot produces steam, increasing the pressure and raising the boiling point of water, which significantly reduces cooking time. Pressure cookers are versatile tools suitable for cooking a variety of foods, including meats, beans, grains, and vegetables, while retaining nutrients and flavors. They are valued for their efficiency, convenience, and ability to tenderize tough cuts of meat in a fraction of the time required by traditional cooking methods.

data.translation: a device that uses hot air or oil to pop kernels of corn into popcorn
data.description: A popcorn maker is an appliance used to quickly and easily pop popcorn kernels. It typically uses hot air or oil to heat the kernels, causing them to expand and turn into fluffy popcorn. There are different types of popcorn makers, including air poppers, which use hot air for a healthier option, and oil-based models that provide a richer flavor. Popcorn makers are popular for making fresh, homemade popcorn for snacks or parties. They are easy to use, clean, and offer a quick way to enjoy a classic treat without the need for a stovetop or microwave.

data.translation: a kitchen appliance for automatic rice cooking
data.description: A rice cooker is a kitchen appliance specifically designed for cooking rice. It typically consists of an outer casing with a removable inner cooking pot, a heating element, and a thermostat. Rice cookers work by heating the inner pot to bring the water and rice to a boil, then automatically adjusting the heat to simmer the rice until it's fully cooked. Once the rice is done, the cooker switches to a "keep warm" mode to maintain the temperature and texture of the rice until it is ready to be served. Rice cookers come in various sizes and styles, ranging from basic models with one-touch operation to more advanced units with digital displays and programmable settings.

data.translation: a kitchen appliance used for toasting and grilling sandwiches
data.description: A sandwich maker is a kitchen appliance used to quickly prepare hot, toasted sandwiches. It typically consists of two heated plates that press together to grill the sandwich, creating a crispy exterior while warming the filling. Sandwich makers often have non-stick surfaces for easy cleaning and may include features like adjustable heat settings or removable plates. They are popular for making simple meals, as they allow users to create sandwiches with a variety of fillings, such as cheese, meats, or vegetables, in just a few minutes.

data.translation: an electric appliance which is used for cooking meat or vegetables at a low temperature in liquid
data.description: A slow cooker, also known as a crock-pot, is an electric kitchen appliance used for cooking food over an extended period of time at low temperatures. It consists of a ceramic or metal pot within a heating element, that cooks food slowly and evenly. Slow cookers are ideal for preparing stews, soups, roasts, and other dishes that require long, slow simmering. They offer convenience and versatility, allowing users to prepare meals in the morning and return home to a delicious, fully cooked dinner in the evening.

data.translation: a kitchen appliance used for mixing, kneading, and whisking ingredients, featuring a motorized unit with a rotating attachment and a bowl that sits on a stand
data.description: A stand mixer is a kitchen appliance used for mixing, beating, and kneading ingredients. It consists of a motorized base with a mixing bowl and a set of attachments, such as a whisk, paddle, or dough hook. Stand mixers are commonly used for tasks like making dough, batter, or whipped cream. Unlike hand mixers, stand mixers are stationary and require less effort from the user, as they mix ingredients automatically. They are popular in home kitchens and professional settings for their convenience and ability to handle large or heavy batches.

data.translation: a kitchen appliance used to cook waffle batter between two hot plates, creating crispy, grid-patterned waffles
data.description: A waffle iron is a kitchen appliance used for cooking waffles, a type of batter-based dish with a distinctive grid pattern. It typically consists of two hinged metal plates with grid patterns on the inside and long handles for easy flipping. To use a waffle iron, batter is poured onto the bottom plate, and the top plate is closed, pressing the batter between the two plates. The heat from the plates cooks the batter, forming crispy waffles with a golden-brown exterior and a soft, fluffy interior. Waffle irons come in various shapes and sizes, including traditional square or rectangular designs and specialty shapes like hearts or animals.

data.translation: a device or appliance that provides a convenient source of drinking water
data.description: A water dispenser is a device that provides access to drinking water, typically in homes, offices, or public spaces. It dispenses water in various forms, including chilled, room temperature, or hot, depending on the type of dispenser. There are different types of water dispensers available, including bottled water dispensers, which use large water bottles placed on top of the dispenser, and bottleless water dispensers, which are connected directly to a water supply line. Some water dispensers also feature filtration systems to remove impurities and improve the taste and quality of the water.

data.translation: an electronic device used in the kitchen to make toast
data.description: A toaster is a small kitchen appliance used for toasting slices of bread, bagels, or other similar baked goods. It typically consists of a metal or plastic enclosure with slots into which bread slices are inserted. When activated, the toaster heats up internal elements that toast the bread by direct heat radiation. Toasters usually feature adjustable settings to control the degree of toasting, allowing users to achieve their preferred level of crispiness. They come in various sizes and styles, from simple two-slice toasters to larger models capable of toasting four slices at a time.

data.translation: an electrical device used to blend, mix, or puree food and liquids into a smooth consistency
data.description: A blender is a kitchen appliance used to mix, chop, puree, or blend ingredients. It has a motorized base with sharp blades inside a jar or container. Blenders are commonly used for making smoothies, soups, sauces, and other food and drink preparations. By turning the ingredients into a smooth or finely chopped mixture, blenders make food preparation faster and easier. Some blenders also have multiple speed settings or additional features like ice-crushing capabilities. They are popular in homes and restaurants for their versatility and convenience.

data.translation: a box-shaped piece of equipment with a front door that is usually part of a stove, used for baking, cooking, or heating food
data.description: An oven is a kitchen appliance used for baking, roasting, heating, or drying food by surrounding it with dry heat. It typically consists of an enclosed compartment with heating elements or gas flames that raise the temperature to the desired level. Ovens can be powered by electricity, gas, or even wood in traditional or outdoor settings. They are essential tools in cooking a wide range of dishes, from bread and pastries to meats and casseroles, providing consistent and controlled heat for even cooking.

data.translation: a box-shaped equipment used for cooking or heating food by either putting it inside or on top of the equipment
data.description: A stove is a kitchen appliance used for cooking food by applying heat to pots, pans, or other cookware placed on its surface. It typically consists of one or more heating elements, such as gas burners or electric coils, arranged on top of a flat surface made of metal, glass, or ceramic. Stoves are essential tools in the kitchen, providing a controlled and efficient means of preparing a wide range of dishes through methods such as boiling, simmering, frying, and sautéing.

data.translation: a machine used for making coffee
a kitchen appliance that uses electricity to quickly heat or cook food
data.description: A microwave is a kitchen appliance that heats and cooks food by using microwave radiation to agitate water molecules within the food. This agitation generates heat, quickly and efficiently cooking or reheating dishes. Microwaves are known for their convenience and speed, allowing for rapid cooking without the need for preheating, making them popular for busy households. They come in various sizes and styles, including countertop models and built-in units, offering a range of features such as different power levels, cooking presets, and defrosting options. While primarily used for heating leftovers or cooking ready-made meals, microwaves can also be used for steaming vegetables, popping popcorn, and even baking certain dishes.

data.translation: a kitchen appliance used for boiling water quickly and efficiently, usually made of metal or plastic and equipped with a heating element, a water-level indicator, and an automatic shut-off feature
data.description: An electric kettle is an appliance used to quickly heat water. It has a heating element at the base that heats up when powered on, causing the water to boil faster than on a stove. Electric kettles are commonly used to make tea, coffee, or hot beverages and can also be used for tasks like preparing instant soups or oatmeal. They typically have a handle for easy pouring, a lid to keep the water from spilling, and an automatic shut-off feature to prevent overheating once the water reaches boiling point.

data.translation: an electrical container that can store food for a long time at a temperature that is very low
a small machine attached to the top of the waste pipe of a kitchen sink for shredding food waste
data.description: A garbage disposal unit is a device installed under a kitchen sink that helps grind and shred food waste into smaller pieces so they can be safely flushed down the drain. It works by using a motor to rotate a set of blades, which break down the waste into fine particles. This unit helps reduce the amount of food waste that ends up in the trash and makes cleaning up after meals more convenient. Garbage disposal units are commonly found in many homes and are considered a helpful tool for maintaining a clean and odor-free kitchen.

data.translation: a kitchen appliance designed to boil or steam eggs to a desired level of doneness
data.description: An egg cooker is a kitchen appliance designed to cook eggs quickly and easily. It typically allows users to cook eggs in various ways, such as soft, medium, or hard boiled, and sometimes even poached or scrambled. Egg cookers usually have a water container, a heating element, and an egg tray where the eggs are placed. They often include a timer and automatic shut-off feature once the eggs are cooked. Egg cookers are popular for their convenience, providing consistent results without the need for constant monitoring during cooking.

data.translation: a flat, typically round dish that we eat from or serve food on
data.description: A plate is a flat, typically round dish with a raised rim, normally used for serving and eating food. Plates come in various sizes and materials, such as ceramic, glass, metal, or plastic, and they are available in different shapes and designs to suit various purposes and preferences. They are essential kitchen utensils used for serving main courses, side dishes, appetizers, and desserts. Plates are also commonly used for portioning and presenting food in an appealing manner, whether at home or in restaurants.

data.translation: a round, deep container with an open top, used for holding food or liquid
data.description: A bowl is a round, deep dish with a flat bottom and curved sides, typically used for holding and serving food or liquids. Bowls come in various sizes and materials, such as ceramic, glass, metal, or plastic, and they are available in different shapes and designs to suit various purposes and preferences. They are versatile kitchen utensils used for serving soups, salads, cereals, desserts, and other dishes. Bowls can also be used for mixing ingredients during cooking or baking, as well as for storing food in the refrigerator or pantry.

data.translation: an object with a handle and three or four sharp points that we use for picking up and eating food
data.description: A fork is a utensil with a handle and usually two or more prongs, used for lifting, turning, or eating food. It typically consists of a narrow, elongated handle attached to a wider end with prongs or tines. Forks are commonly made from materials such as stainless steel, silver, or plastic, and they come in various sizes and designs to suit different culinary purposes.

data.translation: an object that has a handle with a shallow bowl at one end that is used for eating, serving, or stirring food
data.description: A spoon is a utensil consisting of a small, shallow bowl attached to a handle, typically used for stirring, serving, or consuming liquid or semi-liquid foods. Spoons come in various shapes and sizes, depending on their intended use. Spoons can be made from a variety of materials, including metal, plastic, wood, or ceramic, and they often feature decorative or ergonomic designs for aesthetic appeal and comfortable use.

data.translation: a sharp blade with a handle that is used for cutting or as a weapon
data.description: A knife is a sharp-edged tool or utensil used for cutting, slicing, or preparing food. Knives come in various shapes and sizes, each designed for specific tasks in the kitchen. Common types of knives include chef's knives, utility knives, paring knives, bread knives, and steak knives. They typically consist of a blade, which is the sharp cutting edge, and a handle for gripping and maneuvering the knife. Knives can be made of various materials, such as stainless steel, carbon steel, or ceramic, and they are essential tools for chopping vegetables, slicing meat, and performing other food preparation tasks.

data.translation: a small cup typically used for drinking tea
data.description: A teacup is a small, typically cylindrical vessel used for drinking tea. It is characterized by its petite size, usually smaller than a regular coffee cup, and may or may not have a handle for easy gripping. Teacups are commonly made of ceramic, porcelain, or fine china, although they can also be made of glass or other materials. They often come with matching saucers, which provide a place to rest the cup when not in use or to hold small snacks or biscuits. Teacups may feature various designs, colors, and patterns, ranging from simple and understated to ornate and decorative, depending on personal taste and style preferences.

data.translation: a large cup which is typically used for drinking hot beverages like coffee, tea, or hot chocolate
data.description: A mug is a type of cylindrical cup with a handle, typically used for serving hot beverages such as coffee, tea, hot chocolate, or soup. Mugs are usually larger and sturdier than cups, designed to hold more liquid and provide a comfortable grip. They come in various shapes, sizes, and materials, including ceramic, porcelain, glass, stainless steel, or even plastic, and they may feature different designs, colors, and patterns to suit different preferences and occasions.

data.translation: a container that is used for drinks and is made of glass
data.description: A glass, in the context of drinkware, is a container used for serving various beverages, including water, juice, soda, cocktails, and other alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks. It is typically made of transparent or translucent material, such as glass or crystal, allowing the contents to be visible. Glasses come in a wide range of shapes, sizes, and designs, each suited for different types of drinks and occasions. They may have stems and bases, or they may be stemless, depending on the style and functionality.

data.translation: a container which is round, deep, and typically made of metal, used for cooking
data.description: A pot is a kitchen utensil used for cooking food by boiling, stewing, or simmering. It typically consists of a deep, round container with straight or slightly flared sides, a flat bottom, and two handles on either side for easy lifting and pouring. Pots come in various sizes and materials, including stainless steel, aluminum, cast iron, and ceramic, each offering different advantages for cooking. They are used for preparing a wide range of dishes, from soups, stews, and sauces to pasta, rice, and boiled vegetables.

data.translation: a metal container with a long handle and a lid, used for cooking
data.description: A pan is a basic kitchen utensil used for cooking food on a stovetop. It typically consists of a flat-bottomed cooking surface with slightly sloped or straight sides, a long handle, and sometimes a lid. Pans come in various shapes, sizes, and materials, including stainless steel, aluminum, cast iron, and non-stick coatings. They are versatile tools used for a wide range of cooking methods, including frying, sautéing, searing, simmering, and even baking.

data.translation: a kitchen tool having a surface with sharped holes used for cutting food into very small pieces
data.description: A grater is a kitchen tool used for shredding food into fine pieces or strands. It typically consists of a flat or box-like surface with sharp, serrated edges made of metal or other durable materials. Graters come in various sizes and styles, including handheld graters, box graters, and rotary graters, each offering different features and benefits. To use a grater, you rub or press the food item against the sharp edges, which shred it into smaller pieces that fall through the openings or slots onto a surface below.

data.translation: a tool used to open cans of food
data.description: A can opener is a kitchen tool used for opening cans or tins. It typically consists of a handle and a cutting mechanism with a sharp blade. To use a can opener, you place the cutting wheel or blade against the edge of the can lid and then rotate the handle, which causes the blade to puncture and cut through the lid, allowing it to be removed. Can openers come in various designs, including manual handheld models and electric versions, each offering different features and benefits.

data.translation: a plastic or metal bowl with many holes that is used for separating water from washed or cooked food
data.description: A colander is a kitchen utensil used for draining liquids from food or rinsing ingredients such as fruits, vegetables, or pasta. It typically consists of a bowl-shaped container with small holes in the bottom and sides, allowing water to drain out while retaining the solid food inside. Colanders come in various sizes and materials, including metal, plastic, and silicone, and may have handles or feet for stability and ease of use.

data.translation: a wooden or plastic board on which meat or vegetables are cut
data.description: A cutting board is a flat, sturdy surface used for cutting, chopping, and preparing food. It is typically made of wood, plastic, bamboo, or other food-safe materials and comes in various shapes and sizes to accommodate different kitchen tasks. Cutting boards provide a protective surface for countertops and tables, preventing damage from knives and reducing the risk of cross-contamination between different foods. They are essential tools in any kitchen, providing a stable and sanitary surface for slicing fruits, vegetables, meats, and other ingredients.

data.translation: a kitchen tool used to hold and dry dishes after washing
data.description: A dish rack is a kitchen accessory used for air-drying washed dishes, utensils, and cookware. It typically consists of a rack or tray with slots or compartments for organizing and holding dishes upright, allowing air to circulate and dry them naturally. Dish racks come in various sizes and styles, including countertop models, over-the-sink designs, or collapsible versions for compact storage. Some dish racks also include additional features such as drainage spouts, utensil holders, or removable trays for collecting water runoff.

data.translation: a shallow, rectangular or square-shaped container, often made of plastic, used for washing dishes by hand
data.description: A dish pan is a large, shallow container used for washing dishes by hand. It is typically made of plastic or metal and is designed to hold water, soap, and dishes while cleaning. Dish pans are often placed in sinks to catch water or used as a portable option for washing dishes when a sink is not available. They are popular for washing dishes, utensils, and other kitchen items that need to be scrubbed or rinsed. Dish pans are practical for cleaning multiple items at once, helping to keep the kitchen organized.

data.translation: ‌a handheld object with small pieces of curved wire used for whipping cream or eggs
data.description: A whisk is a kitchen utensil used for mixing or whipping ingredients. It typically consists of a handle with several wire loops attached to the end. Whisks come in various sizes and styles, including balloon whisks with rounded heads for whipping air into batters or creams, flat whisks with wider heads for mixing sauces or gravies in shallow pans, and mini whisks for smaller tasks like beating eggs or blending dressings. Whisks are valued for their ability to quickly and efficiently combine ingredients, incorporating air and creating smooth, uniform textures in dishes.

data.translation: a small handheld kitchen tool used for crushing garlic
data.description: A garlic press is a handheld kitchen tool used specifically for crushing and mincing garlic cloves. It typically consists of two hinged handles with a chamber in between, fitted with a textured surface. To use a garlic press, you place a peeled garlic clove inside the chamber, then squeeze the handles together, forcing the garlic through the textured surface and mincing it into small pieces.

data.translation: a container with a wide opening and a lid, typically made of glass or ceramic, used to store food such as honey, jam, pickles, etc.
data.description: A jar is a cylindrical container with a wide mouth and a screw-on or snap-on lid, typically made of glass, ceramic, or plastic. Jars are commonly used for storing and preserving various food items, such as jams, jellies, pickles, sauces, spreads, and dry goods like grains, beans, and spices. They can also be used for storing non-food items, such as candles, craft supplies, or personal care products. Jars come in various sizes and shapes, including round, square, or hexagonal, and they may feature decorative elements or designs on the exterior.

data.translation: a kitchen tool with a broad and flat part on one end, used for turning and lifting food
data.description: A spatula is a versatile kitchen tool used for flipping or lifting food. It typically consists of a flat, broad blade made of metal, silicone, plastic, or wood, attached to a long handle for easy manipulation. Spatulas come in various shapes and sizes, with some having straight edges while others have tapered or angled edges. They are used for tasks such as flipping pancakes, burgers, or eggs and lifting cookies or baked goods off baking sheets.

data.translation: a kitchen tool designed to mash cooked vegetables, fruits, or other foods into a soft and uniform texture
data.description: A masher is a kitchen utensil used for crushing or mashing cooked vegetables, fruits, or other foods into a smooth or chunky consistency. It typically consists of a long handle attached to a flat, hole-filled or solid surface, which is used to press and crush the food. They are commonly used for mashing potatoes, beans, avocados, or other soft foods to prepare dishes like mashed potatoes, guacamole, or refried beans.

data.translation: a special device or knife for removing the skin of vegetables or fruit
data.description: A peeler is a kitchen tool used for removing the skin or outer layer of fruits and vegetables. It typically consists of a handle attached to a sharp, flat blade, which is used to scrape away the peel from the surface of the food. Peeling fruits and vegetables with a peeler helps to remove any tough or inedible outer layers, revealing the softer, edible flesh beneath. Peeling can improve the texture and appearance of certain foods and may also remove any wax or pesticide residues from the surface. Peeler come in various styles, including straight-blade peelers, Y-shaped peelers, and serrated peelers, each offering different features and benefits.

data.translation: a handheld tool with a conical ridged end used for manually extracting juice from citrus fruits like lemons, limes, and oranges
data.description: A reamer is a kitchen tool used for extracting juice from citrus fruits such as oranges, lemons, or limes. It typically consists of a pointed, cone-shaped head with ridges or teeth. To use a reamer, you cut the citrus fruit in half and then press the pointed end of the reamer into the flesh, twisting and rotating it to extract the juice while leaving the seeds and pulp behind.

data.translation: a container with a handle, lid, and spout for brewing and serving tea
data.description: A teapot is a vessel specifically designed for steeping and serving tea. It typically features a handle for easy pouring, a spout for dispensing the brewed tea, and a lid to cover the opening where the tea leaves are placed. Teapots come in a variety of shapes, sizes, and materials, including ceramic, porcelain, glass, cast iron, and stainless steel. Some teapots may have built-in infusers or strainers to hold loose tea leaves while steeping, while others may require the use of separate tea accessories such as tea balls or filters. Teapots are used to brew a wide range of teas, including black, green, oolong, white, and herbal teas, and they are often accompanied by matching cups or mugs for serving.

data.translation: a flat kitchen utensil with a long handle used to lift and flip foods, such as pancakes, burgers, and vegetables, while cooking
data.description: A turner, also known as a flipping spatula or flipper, is a kitchen utensil primarily used for flipping and turning foods while cooking. It typically consists of a flat, wide blade made of metal, silicone, or nylon, attached to a long handle for easy manipulation. Turners come in various shapes and sizes, with some having straight edges while others have tapered or angled edges. They are used for tasks such as flipping pancakes, burgers, or eggs, turning sautéed vegetables or meats, lifting and transferring delicate foods like fish fillets or omelets, and scraping up bits from the bottom of pans.

data.translation: a kitchen tool used to chop or mince food into smaller pieces, such as onions, herbs, nuts, or vegetables
data.description: A chopper is a versatile kitchen tool used for chopping, mincing, and dicing ingredients such as vegetables, fruits, nuts, and herbs. It typically consists of a sharp, heavy blade attached to a handle, allowing for easy maneuverability and forceful chopping motions. Choppers come in various sizes and designs, from large chef's choppers to handheld mincing tools. The blade may be curved or straight, and some choppers feature ridges to prevent food from sticking.

data.translation: one of the two thin, typically wooden sticks, used particularly by people of China, Japan, etc., to eat food
data.description: Chopsticks are slender, elongated utensils traditionally used for eating in many Asian cultures, particularly in China, Japan, Korea, and Vietnam. Typically made of wood, bamboo, metal, or plastic, chopsticks consist of two tapered sticks of equal length that are held in one hand and used to pick up and manipulate food. Chopsticks are essential tools in Asian cuisine, allowing for precise and delicate handling of various types of food, including rice, noodles, vegetables, and meats. They are often paired with a small ceramic rest to prevent them from touching the table surface when not in use. Chopsticks come in various lengths and designs, with different levels of tapering and surface textures to accommodate different preferences and dining customs.

data.translation: a medium-sized spoon designed for eating dessert
data.description: A dessert spoon is a type of spoon typically used for eating desserts and sweet treats. It is larger than a teaspoon but smaller than a tablespoon, with a bowl that is deeper and wider than a teaspoon but shallower and narrower than a tablespoon. Dessert spoons are designed to hold larger bites of dessert while still being able to fit comfortably in the mouth. They are commonly used for enjoying a wide variety of desserts, including puddings, custards, ice cream, fruit salads, and other sweet dishes. Dessert spoons are commonly made from materials such as stainless steel, silver, or even plastic, and they come in various designs and finishes to complement different tableware sets.

data.translation: a specialized table knife with a sharp serrated edge designed to easily cut through cooked meat, especially steak
data.description: A steak knife is a specialized kitchen utensil designed for cutting cooked meat, particularly steak. Typically featuring a sharp, pointed blade with serrated edges, it allows for easy slicing through the tougher texture of steak without tearing or shredding the meat. The handle is often designed for a comfortable grip, providing stability and control during use. Steak knives come in various sizes and styles, ranging from traditional to modern designs, and are essential tools for enjoying a perfectly prepared steak meal.

data.translation: a non-serrated knife with a rounded tip, used for cutting and eating food at the dining table
data.description: A table knife is a versatile dining utensil commonly found in cutlery sets and used for general dining purposes. A table knife typically has a rounded tip and a straight, smooth blade. It is designed to be used for cutting softer foods like vegetables, bread, and other items typically served at the dining table. Table knives are often crafted with comfortable handles for easy gripping and maneuvering during meals.

data.translation: a kitchen utensil with two bars that when pushed one can lift small items
data.description: Tongs are versatile kitchen utensils consisting of two long handles joined at one end by a hinge or pivot point, often with a gripping mechanism at the opposite end. They are used for grasping, lifting, and manipulating a variety of food items, particularly those that are hot, slippery, or delicate. Tongs come in various sizes and designs, with some featuring scalloped or serrated edges for improved grip, while others have silicone or heat-resistant tips for handling hot items without causing damage. Common types of tongs include serving tongs, grill tongs, salad tongs, and sugar tongs, each designed for specific culinary tasks.

data.translation: a container with holes in the top used for dispensing salt
data.description: A salt shaker is a small container with tiny holes on the top, designed to dispense salt evenly over food. Typically made of glass, plastic, or metal, salt shakers come in various shapes, sizes, and designs to suit different preferences and décor styles. They often have a removable top or lid for easy refilling and cleaning. Salt shakers are a common table accessory found in kitchens, dining rooms, restaurants, and cafes, providing a convenient way to add salt to meals according to taste. They are often paired with pepper shakers to offer a complete set of seasonings at the dining table.

data.translation: a kitchen tool used to grind whole peppercorns into a finer powder
data.description: A pepper mill is a kitchen tool used for grinding peppercorns into fresh ground pepper. It typically consists of a cylindrical body with a grinding mechanism inside and a handle or knob at the top for rotating the mechanism. Pepper mills come in various sizes and styles, including manual hand-operated models and electric versions powered by batteries or electricity. To use a pepper mill, you fill the chamber with whole peppercorns, then adjust the grind settings to control the coarseness or fineness of the ground pepper. When you turn the handle or press a button, the grinding mechanism crushes the peppercorns, releasing their aromatic oils and flavors.

data.translation: the removable cover at the top of a container
data.description: A lid is a cover or top that fits securely over the opening of a pot, pan, or other cooking vessel. It is used to trap heat and moisture during cooking, which helps to cook food evenly and retain its flavors and nutrients. Lids come in various shapes and sizes to fit different pots and pans, and they are typically made of the same material as the cooking vessel, such as glass, metal, or silicone. Some lids have handles or knobs for easy lifting and removal, while others may have built-in features like vents or steam holes to allow excess steam to escape.

data.translation: a shallow pan with a long handle, used for frying food
data.description: A skillet, also known as a frying pan or frypan, is a versatile kitchen utensil used for frying, sautéing, searing, and even baking. It typically features a flat bottom and low, slightly sloped sides, along with a long handle for easy maneuvering. Skillets come in various sizes and materials, including stainless steel, cast iron, aluminum, and non-stick coatings, each offering different advantages for cooking. They are used for preparing a wide range of dishes, from breakfast foods like eggs and pancakes to main courses like stir-fries, pastas, and sauces.

data.translation: a type of large spoon with a long handle and a deep bowl, particularly used for serving liquid food
data.description: A ladle is a kitchen utensil used for serving and portioning liquids, such as soups, stews, sauces, or beverages. It typically consists of a long handle attached to a deep, bowl-shaped scoop at one end. Ladles come in various sizes and materials, including stainless steel, plastic, or silicone, and may have a round or oval-shaped bowl.

data.translation: a small tool with a pointy spiral metal for pulling out corks from bottles
data.description: A corkscrew is a handheld tool used for removing corks from bottles, typically wine bottles. It typically consists of a metal spiral, with a pointed end for piercing the cork, attached to a handle or lever. To use a corkscrew, you insert the spiral into the center of the cork and then twist it into the cork until the spiral is fully inserted. Then, you use the handle or lever to pull the cork out of the bottle, using the leverage to ease it out smoothly. Corkscrews come in various styles, including simple handheld models, waiter's corkscrews with fold-out handles, and electric corkscrews that automatically remove the cork with the press of a button.

data.translation: a flat object with elevated edges, often used for holding or carrying food and drink
data.description: A tray is a flat, shallow container with raised edges, often used for carrying or serving food, beverages, or other items. Trays come in various shapes, sizes, and materials, such as metal, plastic, wood, or bamboo. They may have handles for easy carrying or may be designed to stack for storage purposes. Trays serve a practical purpose of transporting items from one place to another, such as carrying drinks or snacks from the kitchen to the living room during a gathering. They are also used for serving meals or displaying decorative items.

data.translation: a glass or plastic container that has a narrow neck and is used for storing drinks or other liquids
data.description: A bottle is a container typically made of glass, plastic, or metal, with a narrow neck and an opening at the top, used for storing and transporting liquids. Bottles come in various shapes, sizes, and designs, each suited for different types of liquids and purposes. Common types of bottles include those used for water, juice, wine, oil, vinegar, condiments, and toiletries, among others. Bottles may have features such as caps, corks, or screw tops to seal the contents and prevent leakage or contamination. They are versatile containers found in households, restaurants, supermarkets, and other retail outlets, used for packaging and storing a wide range of liquids for consumption, cooking, cleaning, and personal care.

data.translation: a deep round container with a handle and a curved opening, used for pouring liquids
data.description: A pitcher is a type of container used for holding and pouring liquids. It typically features a wide mouth, a handle, and a spout for easy pouring. Pitchers come in various sizes, shapes, and materials, including glass, ceramic, plastic, or metal. They are commonly used for serving beverages such as water, juice, iced tea, lemonade, or cocktails, and they are often found in households, restaurants, bars, and other dining establishments.

data.translation: a stemmed drinking glass with a bowl-shaped top that narrows to concentrate the aroma of wine
data.description: A wineglass is a type of stemmed glassware specifically designed for serving wine. It typically consists of a stem, a bowl, and a rim. The bowl of a wineglass is designed to capture and enhance the aromas of the wine, while the stem allows the drinker to hold the glass without warming the wine with their hand. Wine glasses come in various shapes and sizes, each suited to different types of wine.

data.translation: a baking dish, usually round or rectangular in shape, that is used for baking cakes and other baked goods
data.description: A cake pan is a round, square, or rectangular metal or non-stick pan specifically designed for baking cakes. It typically has straight, tall sides and a flat bottom to support the cake batter as it bakes. Cake pans come in various sizes and depths, allowing for different cake sizes and thicknesses. They may also feature removable bottoms or springform designs for easy release of the baked cake.

data.translation: a flat, shallow container for cooking food in or serving it from
data.description: A dish is a shallow, flat container typically used for serving or cooking food. Dishes come in various shapes, sizes, and materials, including ceramic, glass, metal, or plastic. They can be used for a wide range of purposes, from serving individual portions of food to baking or roasting dishes in the oven. Dishes may have decorative patterns or designs to enhance their appearance, and they are essential items in any kitchen or dining setting for preparing, serving, and presenting food.

data.translation: a container with perforations on the top used for storing and dispensing ground pepper
data.description: A pepper pot is a small container, usually made of glass, ceramic, or metal, used for holding and dispensing ground pepper onto food. It typically has a top with tiny holes allowing one to dispense pepper evenly over food. Pepper pots come in various sizes and designs, ranging from simple and functional to decorative and ornate. They are a common table accessory found in kitchens, dining rooms, restaurants, and cafes, providing a convenient way to season meals with freshly ground pepper. Pepper pots are often paired with salt shakers to offer a complete set of seasonings at the dining table.

data.translation: a large, flat serving dish used for presenting food, often used for serving meat, cheese, fruit, or vegetables
data.description: A platter is a large, flat serving dish used for presenting and serving food, particularly main courses or appetizers. Platters come in various shapes, sizes, and materials, including ceramic, glass, metal, or wood. They may have decorative patterns, textures, or rims to enhance their appearance and complement the presentation of the food.

data.translation: a long, serrated knife designed specifically for slicing through bread and other baked goods without crushing or squishing them
data.description: A bread knife is a kitchen tool with a long, serrated blade specifically designed for slicing bread. It typically features a sharp edge with teeth or serrations along one side of the blade, allowing it to easily grip and cut through crusty bread without squishing or tearing the soft interior. Bread knives come in various lengths and styles, but they are usually longer and narrower than typical kitchen knives.

data.translation: a bowl typically used in cooking and baking for combining ingredients
data.description: A mixing bowl is a kitchen utensil used for combining ingredients, mixing batters, and preparing various recipes. It typically consists of a round, deep bowl made of glass, ceramic, stainless steel, or plastic, with a wide mouth and a stable base. Mixing bowls come in various sizes, from small to extra-large, to accommodate different quantities of ingredients. They may also feature a pour spout, handles, or a non-slip base for added convenience during use. Mixing bowls are essential tools in cooking and baking, allowing cooks to easily mix and blend ingredients for a wide range of dishes, from cakes and cookies to salads and marinades.

data.translation: a round-bowled spoon designed for eating soup or similar liquid dishes
data.description: A soup spoon is a type of utensil designed for eating soup and other liquid-based dishes. It typically features a rounded, shallow bowl with a relatively large capacity, allowing for easy scooping and sipping of broth or other liquids. The handle of a soup spoon is usually longer than that of a regular spoon, providing a comfortable grip for the consumption of hot liquids without risk of burning oneself. Soup spoons come in various materials, including stainless steel, silver, or ceramic, and they may have decorative or functional embellishments.

data.translation: a container used for serving butter, which typically consists of a base and a lid
data.description: A butter dish is a container specifically designed for holding and serving butter. It typically consists of a base and a lid, with the base holding the butter and the lid covering it to keep it fresh and protected. Butter dishes come in various materials, such as ceramic, glass, porcelain, or stainless steel, and they may have decorative designs or patterns. Some butter dishes have handles or knobs for easy lifting and carrying.

data.translation: a container with numbers on it for measuring the quantity of something when cooking, used mainly in the US
data.description: A measuring cup is a kitchen tool used for accurately measuring and dispensing liquid or dry ingredients. It typically consists of a cup-shaped container with graduated markings on the side indicating volume measurements such as ounces, milliliters, cups, or tablespoons. Measuring cups come in various sizes, materials, and styles, including glass, plastic, or metal, and may have a spout for easy pouring. They are valued for their precision and convenience in ensuring accurate ingredient proportions for recipes, whether for baking, cooking, or mixing beverages.

data.translation: the structure that creates the outer top part of a vehicle, building, etc.
an upright structure, usually made of brick, concrete, or stone that is made to divide, protect, or surround a place
a space in a wall or vehicle that is made of glass and we use to look outside or get some fresh air
the thing we move to enter, exit, or access a place such as a vehicle, building, room, etc.
the bottom of a room that we walk on
a room we use for sleeping
the part of a house where people spend time together talking, watching television, relaxing, etc.
data.description: A living room is a common area in a home where people gather to relax, socialize, or entertain guests. It is usually furnished with comfortable seating like sofas and chairs, along with tables, lamps, and sometimes entertainment devices like a television or stereo. The living room is often one of the main spaces in a house, designed for both casual and formal activities. It serves as a central area for spending time with family or friends and is typically located near the entrance or central part of the home.

data.translation: the place in a building or home where we make food
a room that has a toilet and a sink, and often times a bathtub or a shower as well
a room that we use to eat meals in
a dedicated space for washing, drying, folding, and ironing clothes and linens, typically equipped with a washer, dryer, ironing board, and storage cabinets
the highest part of a room, vehicle, etc. that covers it from the inside
a channel or passage that lets the smoke from a fire pass through and get out from the roof of a building
a series of steps or risers designed for ascending or descending between different levels or floors in a building or structure
a platform above the ground level and on the outside wall of a building that we can get into from the upper floor
data.description: A balcony is a small, raised platform attached to the outside of a building, typically on an upper floor. It is usually enclosed by railings or walls for safety and is accessed through a door or window. Balconies provide an outdoor space for relaxing, enjoying the view, or placing small items like plants or chairs. They are common in apartments, houses, and hotels and offer a private outdoor area without requiring ground-level space. Balconies can add both function and aesthetic appeal to a building.

data.translation: a structure with a roof and no walls at the entrance of a house
data.description: A porch is a covered outdoor area attached to the entrance of a house or building, often serving as a transitional space between the indoors and outdoors. It is typically elevated, with steps leading up to it, and may have a roof supported by posts or columns. Porches can be open or enclosed with screens or glass and are commonly used for relaxing, socializing, or enjoying fresh air. They often feature seating, such as chairs or benches, and can be decorated to create a welcoming entrance to the home.

data.translation: a flat paved area, particularly one next to a building or restaurant, where people can sit, eat, relax, etc.
a passage that is inside a house or building with rooms on both side
a long narrow way in a building that has doors on either side opening into different rooms
an area or room directly under the roof of a house, typically used for storage or as an additional living area
data.description: An attic is a space located directly under the roof of a building, typically used for storage. It is often accessed by a ladder or staircase and may have limited headroom, depending on the roof's shape. Attics can be used to store seasonal items, old furniture, or personal belongings that are not frequently used. In some cases, attics are converted into living spaces, such as additional bedrooms or home offices, once they are properly insulated and renovated. The design and use of an attic largely depend on its size and the building's layout.

data.translation: an area or room in a house or building that is partially or completely below the ground level
data.description: A basement is a room or area located below the main floor of a building, typically used for storage, utilities, or additional living space. Basements are often accessed by stairs and can be partially or fully underground. In many homes, the basement houses systems like the furnace, water heater, and electrical panels. Depending on its condition and design, a basement can be finished to provide extra living space, such as a recreation room, home office, or bedroom. Basements can also be used for laundry, storage, or workshops.

data.translation: a building, usually next or attached to a house, in which cars or other vehicles are kept
data.description: A garage is a building or space, typically attached to or located near a house, used for storing vehicles, tools, or other items. It often has a door that can be opened to allow cars to enter or exit. Garages can vary in size, from small single-car spaces to larger ones that can fit multiple vehicles or serve as additional storage areas. Some garages are used for purposes like workshops or home maintenance tasks, while others are primarily for parking vehicles.

data.translation: an open pipe that is attached beneath the edge of a building roof and carries rainwater away
data.description: A gutter is a long, narrow channel, usually made of metal, plastic, or other materials, that is attached along the edge of a roof. Its main purpose is to collect and carry away rainwater that flows off the roof, directing it away from the walls and foundation of a building. This helps prevent water from causing damage to the structure, such as eroding the foundation, staining the walls, or flooding the surrounding area. Gutters are commonly connected to downspouts, which lead the water down to the ground or a drainage system.

data.translation: a vertical structural element, often made of stone, that supports the weight of the building above it
data.description: A column is a tall, vertical structure used to support a building or other structures. It is often round or square in shape and made of materials like stone, wood, metal, or concrete. Columns are commonly found in architecture, especially in classical designs, where they are used to hold up roofs, porches, or ceilings. They can be decorative as well as functional, sometimes featuring detailed carvings or capitals at the top. Columns are important elements in many buildings, giving them stability while adding aesthetic appeal.

data.translation: a supportive rail fixed to a staircase or walkway, providing a handhold for stability and safety while ascending or descending
data.description: A handrail is a long, horizontal support structure designed to provide stability and assistance for individuals using stairs, ramps, or walkways. Typically installed along the edge of a staircase or the sides of a ramp, handrails are meant to be grasped for support, helping to prevent falls and improve safety. They can be made from various materials, such as wood, metal, or plastic, and can come in different designs and heights to accommodate users. In addition to their functional purpose, handrails can also enhance the aesthetic appeal of a space, contributing to the overall design of the building.

data.translation: a window installed on a roof or ceiling that allows natural light to enter a room from above
data.description: A skylight is a window installed in a roof or ceiling that allows natural light to enter a room from above. It is designed to bring sunlight into spaces that may not have access to traditional windows, making areas feel brighter and more open. Skylights can come in various shapes and sizes, including fixed or operable options that can be opened for ventilation. They are often used in homes, offices, and other buildings to enhance the ambiance and energy efficiency of a space. Additionally, skylights can provide beautiful views of the sky and surroundings, contributing to the overall design of the interior.

data.translation: an underground storage space or room, typically found in a building, used for storing food, wine, or other items that require a cool and dark environment
data.description: A cellar is a room or space located below ground level in a building, often used for storage. It is typically found beneath homes, where it serves as a place to store food, wine, or other items that require cool or dry conditions. Cellars can also be used for additional living space, such as a laundry room or recreation area. They are usually accessed by a staircase or trapdoor and may have small windows or ventilation for air circulation.

data.translation: a service that is provided to the public, such as electricity, water, or gas, which is used in daily life
data.description: A utility refers to a service or system that provides essential resources or services, such as water, electricity, gas, or waste management, to homes and businesses. Utilities are typically provided by public or private companies and are crucial for daily living. For example, electricity is needed to power lights and appliances, while water is necessary for drinking, bathing, and cooking. Utility companies are responsible for maintaining these systems and ensuring they function properly. Utilities are often paid for on a monthly basis through billing systems.

data.translation: the area just inside the entrance of a public building such as a hotel, etc.
data.description: A lobby is the entrance area or waiting space inside a building, usually near the front doors. It often serves as a transitional space between the outside and the rest of the building. Lobbies are commonly found in places like hotels, offices, and apartment buildings. They can be furnished with chairs, tables, and sometimes decorative features like plants or artwork. This area is used for receiving visitors, waiting, or accessing other rooms in the building, such as elevators or staircases.

data.translation: a vertical or inclined passage in a building that allows for the convenient disposal of waste materials by dropping them into a designated collection area or dumpster
data.description: A trash chute is a vertical tube built into a building, designed to allow waste or garbage to be dropped from higher floors to a lower level, often to a central collection area. It is commonly found in apartment buildings, hotels, and office complexes to make the process of disposing of waste more convenient. The chute is usually located in a hallway or near the stairwell, with an opening for users to deposit their trash. At the bottom of the chute, the waste is typically collected in a bin or container for removal.

data.translation: a box-like device that moves up and down and is used to get to the different levels of a building
a level or floor of a building or structure, typically with a horizontal division that separates it from other levels, often used to define the height or number of floors in a building
a curved symmetrical structure that supports the weight above it, used in bridges or buildings
data.description: An arch is a curved structure that spans an opening, typically made of stone, brick, or other materials. It is designed to support weight from above while allowing for clear space below. Arches are often used in doorways, windows, and bridges, creating a strong and stable shape that can distribute weight evenly. The curved design not only provides structural strength but also adds an aesthetic element to buildings and structures. Arches have been used in architecture for thousands of years and are an essential feature in various styles, from ancient Roman to modern design.

data.translation: a network of pipes, fixtures, valves, and other components that work together to supply and distribute water, as well as remove waste and sewage, within a building or structure
data.description: A plumbing system consists of interconnected pipes, fixtures, and fittings in a building that supply water for various purposes and remove wastewater. It includes elements like sinks, toilets, showers, and drains, ensuring the safe delivery and disposal of water. The system relies on water pressure and gravity to function properly and typically connects to a municipal water supply and sewage system. Properly designed plumbing systems are essential for hygiene, comfort, and convenience in homes and other buildings.

data.translation: a structure like a wall, made of wire, wood, etc. that is placed around an area or a piece of land
data.description: A fence is a structure that encloses or separates an area, often made from materials such as wood, metal, or wire. It is used to mark boundaries, provide privacy, enhance security, or keep animals in or out. Fences can vary in height and design, depending on their purpose, and are commonly found around homes, gardens, farms, and public spaces. Some fences are solid and tall for privacy, while others are low or made of wire to define spaces without obstructing views.

data.translation: the part of a fence or wall outside a building that we can open and close to enter or leave a place
an opening like a door, gate, or passage that we can use to enter a building,  room, etc.
the area around the door at the entrance to a house, room, etc.
data.description: A doorway is an opening in a wall or structure that allows people to pass in and out of a room, building, or space. It is typically framed with a door, which can be opened or closed to provide entry or exit. Doorways come in various sizes and designs, depending on the function and style of the building. They are an essential part of the architectural design, often highlighting the entrance and providing access between different areas.

data.translation: a special way used to exit a building, car, etc. when a problem happens
data.description: An emergency exit is a designated door or route that allows people to safely leave a building in case of an emergency, such as a fire or other dangerous situation. These exits are usually clearly marked and easily accessible, often with additional safety features like illuminated signs or alarms. Emergency exits are designed to provide a quick and safe escape from a building to prevent injuries during an emergency. They are a critical component of building safety codes and are required in most public and commercial spaces.

data.translation: a path for walking, typically built outdoors and above the ground level
data.description: A walkway is a narrow path or passage, usually made of paved materials, that is designed for pedestrians to walk on. It is often found in gardens, parks, or along the sides of buildings, providing a safe and convenient route for people to move from one area to another. Walkways can be made of various materials such as concrete, stone, brick, or wood, and are typically designed to enhance the aesthetic appeal and functionality of outdoor spaces. They help guide movement while also contributing to the overall landscape design.

data.translation: the land joined to our house where we can grow grass, flowers, and other plants
data.description: A yard is an outdoor area of land, typically located around a house or building. It can be used for various purposes, such as gardening, playing, or relaxing. Yards are often arranged with grass, plants, trees, and sometimes outdoor structures like patios or fences. They provide a private space for homeowners or renters to enjoy outdoor activities or maintain plants and flowers. Yards can vary in size, from small areas in urban settings to larger spaces in suburban or rural homes. They are often an important part of a property’s overall appeal.

data.translation: the front of a building, particularly one that is large and has an elegant appearance
data.description: A façade refers to the front or exterior face of a building, especially the part that faces a street or open space. It is often the most decorative and distinctive part of a building, designed to create a specific visual impression. Facades can include windows, doors, and architectural details, and may be made from materials like stone, brick, glass, or metal. The design of a façade can reflect the style, purpose, and character of the building, and it often serves as the building's most recognizable feature.

data.translation: a building's roof that is rounded
data.description: A dome is a rounded, curved roof or ceiling that looks like the top half of a sphere. It is often used in large buildings such as churches, mosques, and government structures to create a grand and open space. The dome design evenly distributes weight, making the structure strong and stable. Its shape also allows for good acoustics and can help with natural lighting. Domes are admired for their impressive appearance and are often a central feature in architectural design.

data.translation: a small step in front of the main door of a building or house
data.description: A doorstep is a flat or slightly raised area located at the entrance of a door, often made of materials such as wood, stone, or concrete. This feature provides a transition between the exterior and interior of a building, allowing people to step into or out of a space safely. Doorsteps can also help keep water from entering the building, acting as a barrier against rain or snow. They may be designed for aesthetic purposes, enhancing the entrance's appearance while offering a practical function. Additionally, doorsteps can serve as a convenient place to place items while entering or exiting.

data.translation: a space or place in a wall for building a fire in
data.description: A fireplace is a structure, usually made of brick, stone, or metal, designed to contain a fire for heating or decorative purposes. It typically includes a chimney to vent smoke outside. Fireplaces are often found in living rooms or other gathering spaces and can burn wood, gas, or other fuels. They provide warmth and a cozy atmosphere, especially in colder weather. Modern fireplaces may feature electric or gas-powered versions for convenience, while traditional ones often use wood for a more natural fire experience.

data.translation: an electrical device that controls the flow of electricity to a light fixture, allowing users to turn the light on or off
a room in a ship or building, which is equipped with a heating device
a system that provides a building with warm water and temperature
data.description: Central heating is a system used to heat a building by distributing warmth from a single source to multiple rooms. This system typically involves a central boiler, furnace, or heat pump that heats water, air, or other fluids. These heated fluids are then circulated through pipes, ducts, or radiators to provide warmth throughout the space. Central heating is commonly found in homes, offices, and larger buildings, providing a comfortable indoor temperature during colder months. The system can be powered by gas, electricity, oil, or renewable energy sources, and it helps maintain a consistent, even heat across the building.

data.translation: a platform or floor that has a design that looks like a ship's deck
data.description: A deck is a flat, elevated outdoor platform attached to a house, usually made of wood or composite materials. It is commonly located at the back or side of a house and provides a space for outdoor activities such as dining, entertaining, or relaxing. Decks can be designed with various features, including railings, steps, built-in seating, and even coverings or shades for protection from the sun. They often serve as an extension of indoor living spaces, allowing homeowners to enjoy the outdoors comfortably. Decks are popular for their versatility and ability to enhance the use and appearance of outdoor areas.

data.translation: an outdoor area with paved floor belonging to a house used for sitting, relaxing or eating in
data.description: A patio is an outdoor area, typically paved or made of stone, located next to a house or building. It is often used for relaxing, dining, or entertaining guests. Patios can be furnished with outdoor furniture like chairs, tables, or lounge areas, and may also include features like plants, umbrellas, or outdoor kitchens. They are usually located in the backyard or garden and provide a comfortable space to enjoy the outdoors. Patios are popular for creating a functional, enjoyable outdoor living space.

data.translation: a piece of clothing usually worn by men on the upper half of the body, typically with a collar and sleeves, and with buttons down the front
data.description: A shirt is a type of garment that covers the upper body and typically has sleeves, a collar, and a buttoned or zippered front. Shirts come in various styles, fabrics, and designs, and are worn by both men and women. They are often made of cotton, linen, or synthetic materials, and can be casual or formal in style. Shirts can be worn as a standalone garment, or layered with other clothing such as jackets or sweaters. Some common styles of shirts include t-shirts, polo shirts, dress shirts, and button-up shirts.

data.translation: a casual short-sleeved shirt with no collar, usually made of cotton
data.description: A T-shirt is a casual shirt that typically has short sleeves, a round neckline, and no collar. It is usually made of a light, breathable fabric such as cotton and is designed to be worn as a standalone garment or as an undershirt. T-shirts come in a variety of colors, patterns, and designs, and are a popular choice for casual wear in many countries around the world. The name "T-shirt" is derived from the shirt's T shape when viewed from the front, with the body and sleeves forming a straight line. T-shirts have become a fashion staple and are often used to express personal style, beliefs, and interests.

data.translation: a piece of clothing often with a brim that we wear on our heads, for warmth, as a fashion item or as part of a uniform
data.description: A hat is a head covering that can be made of various materials, such as fabric, straw, felt, or leather, and worn for a variety of purposes. Hats can be worn as protection from the elements, such as sun, rain, or cold, or as a fashion accessory to complete an outfit or make a statement. Hats come in a variety of styles and shapes, from the classic fedora or baseball cap to the traditional bowler or top hat. Some hats also have functional features, such as a brim to shield the face from the sun or a chin strap to keep the hat in place during windy conditions.

data.translation: a type of soft flat hat with a visor, typically worn by men and boys
data.description: A cap is a type of headwear that fits closely to the head and has a visor or bill at the front to protect the eyes from the sun. Caps can be made from a variety of materials such as cotton, wool, leather, and synthetic fabrics. They come in many different styles and designs, including baseball caps, snapback caps, trucker caps, dad caps, and more. Caps are worn for both practical and fashionable reasons and have been a popular accessory for many years. They can be worn by both men and women and are often customized with logos or slogans to express personal style or promote a brand or sports team.

data.translation: a piece of cloth, worn around the neck or head, especially to keep warm
data.description: A scarf is a piece of fabric, typically long and rectangular, that is wrapped around the neck or draped over the shoulders. Scarves can be made of various materials, such as wool, cotton, silk, or cashmere, and can be worn for warmth or as a fashion accessory. They can come in many different colors, patterns, and styles, from plain and simple to intricate and decorative. Scarves can be worn by both men and women and can be styled in different ways, such as a loop, knot, or drape, depending on the occasion and personal preference.

data.translation: item of clothing for our hands with a separate space for each finger
data.description: A glove is a hand covering designed to provide protection, warmth, or a better grip. Gloves can be made from a variety of materials, including leather, wool, cotton, latex, or synthetic fabrics. They can be worn for a variety of purposes, from protecting hands during cold weather to shielding hands from chemicals, germs, or sharp objects. Some gloves are designed for specific activities, such as sports or driving, and may have special features like reinforced palms, extra padding, or touch-screen compatibility. Gloves can come in many different sizes and styles, from fingerless gloves to mittens, and can be worn by people of all ages and genders.

data.translation: a long and narrow item that you usually wear around your waist to hold your clothes in place or to decorate your outfit
data.description: A belt is a flexible strap or band typically made of leather, fabric, or synthetic material that is worn around the waist to secure clothing or hold up pants. Belts come in a variety of styles and sizes, with varying buckle designs and widths. Some belts are plain and utilitarian, while others feature decorative elements such as studs, embossing, or stitching. Belts can be used to add a pop of color or contrast to an outfit or to create a more fitted or structured silhouette. Additionally, belts can serve a practical purpose, such as holding tools or accessories on a work belt or providing support for a weightlifting belt during exercise.

data.translation: a long and narrow piece of fabric tied around the collar, particularly worn by men
data.description: A tie is a narrow length of cloth that is worn around the neck and tied in a knot at the front. Ties are typically made of silk, polyester, or other materials, and come in a variety of colors, patterns, and styles. They are commonly worn as a part of formal attire or as a fashion accessory and are often seen in professional settings such as business meetings or interviews. Ties can be worn with a dress shirt and suit, or with a more casual outfit to add a touch of sophistication. Different tie knots, such as the Windsor knot or the Four-in-Hand knot, can create varying looks and styles.

data.translation: a jacket with a pair of pants or a skirt that are made from the same cloth and should be worn together
data.description: A suit is a set of garments consisting of a jacket and pants or a skirt, typically made of the same fabric and intended to be worn together as a formal or semi-formal outfit. Suits are often tailored to fit the wearer's body and come in a variety of styles and materials such as wool, linen, and silk. They are commonly worn for business or professional occasions, formal events, weddings, and other special occasions. Suits can be worn with a dress shirt and tie, and are often paired with dress shoes.

data.translation: a loose jacket or shirt and pants worn in bed
data.description: Pajamas are a type of sleepwear worn by both men and women. They typically consist of a loose-fitting shirt and pants made from soft and comfortable fabrics like cotton, silk, or flannel. Pajamas are designed to be comfortable to wear while sleeping, and they can come in various styles, such as traditional button-up shirts and pants, or more modern designs like t-shirts and shorts. They can also come in different sizes and designs, ranging from simple and plain to colorful and patterned. Pajamas are a popular sleepwear choice because they provide warmth, comfort, and a sense of relaxation that can help promote a good night's sleep.

data.translation: women's underwear, sleepwear and light robes worn in bed
data.description: Lingerie is a type of women's undergarment that is typically designed to be both functional and visually appealing. It includes a wide range of garments, such as bras, panties, corsets, garter belts, stockings, and more. Lingerie can be made from various materials, such as cotton, silk, lace, or synthetic fabrics, and can come in many different styles, colors, and patterns. Some lingerie is designed to enhance or shape the body, while others are meant to be more decorative or erotic in nature. Lingerie can be worn for everyday use or as part of a special occasion and is often considered a luxury item.

data.translation: a long piece of clothing, made from the same material that towels are made of, worn after or before taking a shower or bath
data.description: A bathrobe is a type of robe that is typically worn after a bath or shower. It is made from a soft and absorbent material, such as cotton or terry cloth, to help dry off the body after bathing. Bathrobes come in different styles and lengths, including full-length and knee-length, and may have a hood, pockets, or a belt to tie around the waist. They are also available in different colors and patterns, making them a popular choice for loungewear or as a cover-up at the beach or pool.

data.translation: clothes that we wear under all the other pieces of clothing right on top of our skin
data.description: Underwear is a type of clothing worn beneath outer garments, next to the skin. It typically includes garments such as bras, panties, boxers, briefs, and undershirts, among others. Underwear is designed to provide support, comfort, and protection to the wearer. It also serves to prevent outerwear from being soiled or damaged by sweat, as well as to provide warmth in colder temperatures. The underwear comes in various styles, materials, and designs to suit different needs and preferences, such as cotton, silk, nylon, or polyester.

data.translation: a piece of underwear worn by women to cover and support their breasts
data.description: A bra is a type of women's undergarment that is designed to support the breasts. It typically consists of two cups that are made from materials such as cotton, polyester, or nylon, and are supported by straps that go over the shoulders and around the back. Bras come in various styles, such as underwire, sports, push-up, and strapless, and are available in a wide range of sizes and colors. They may also feature additional elements such as padding, removable inserts, or hooks and eyes for adjustable sizing.
